title: 26.8.2016 LCU Testing Temporarily Offline (Again)
body: Due to an issues with champion select disconnects causing come players to be unable to ban or select champions, we have disabled LCU testing until a solution is found. We'll announce when testing has resumed.

replies.body: Riot, I beg you. Please don't give me Riot Kayle/Kayle. I don't mind the free skin, but I don't want another champion. I have OCD and I like having exactly 60 champions on my account. If you randomly give me Kayle and make my roster 61 champions, I legit might quit League of Legends. You don't have to give me anything, I don't want anything. Please just don't give me a champion on this account. Please Riot I beg you.

Unfortunately we can't customize the gifts per summoner as they're sent out in large batches. However if you [lodge a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) you can request that the champion be removed from your account.
PLEASE MAKE A NERF ON YASUO, SERIOUSLY
